wikitext.*:
{{#vardefine:str|我们所度过的每个平凡的日常，也许就是连续发生的奇迹。}}{{#vardefine:len|{{#expr:{{#invoke:string|len|{{#var:str}}}}}}}}{{#vardefine:rand0|{{#expr: ({{#time:s}} * 17 + 33 ) mod 255 }}}}{{#vardefine:rand1|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand0}} + 1) * {{#time:i}} + 443 ) mod 255 }}}}{{#vardefine:rand2|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand0}} + 2) * {{#time:i}} + 521 ) mod 255 }}}}{{#vardefine:rand3|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand0}} + 3) * {{#time:i}} + 911 ) mod 255 }}}}{{#loop:times|1|{{#ifexpr:{{#expr:{{#var:len}} mod 3 }} != 0 |{{#expr:({{#var:len}} - ({{#var:len}} mod 3)) div 3 + 1}}| {{#expr:{{#var:len}} div 3 }} }}| {{#vardefine:rand1|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand1}} + 1) * {{#time:i}} + 101 ) mod 255 }}}} {{#vardefine:rand2|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand2}} + 2) * {{#time:i}} + 401 ) mod 255 }}}} {{#vardefine:rand3|{{#expr: (({{#var:rand3}} + 3) * {{#time:i}} + 773 ) mod 255 }}}} {{#vardefine:row|{{#expr:({{#var:times}}-1) * 3 }}}}
{{#ifexpr:{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 1 }}<={{#var:len}}|{{#invoke:string|pos|{{#var:str}}|{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 1 }}}}|}}{{#ifexpr:{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 2 }}<={{#var:len}}|{{#invoke:string|pos|{{#var:str}}|{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 2 }}}}|}}{{#ifexpr:{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 3 }}<={{#var:len}}|{{#invoke:string|pos|{{#var:str}}|{{#expr:{{#var:row}} + 3 }}}}|}}
}}
